extendedInfo.description: Are you a fan of going to the movies?  How about the smell of fresh popcorn, the big screen, the surround sound and that intensity you cannot find anywhere except watching a movie on the big screen? Movieology, is a trivia game that allows you to answer trivia questions about your favorite movies and earn points while playing.  Movieology, is a free game that will test your knowledge of movies and along the way may reveal you some interesting movie trivia.  Movieology has a database of hundreds of movie trivia questions, from classic movies to the 70s, 80s and 90s.Here are a few sample questions:1) What actor had his fingers glued together by the director J.J. Abrams in order to perfect his salute?2) What character in the movie Transformers says the line 'What'd they get you for?'?3) What is the name of the character that Johnny Depp portrays in Pirates of the Caribbean?Movieology - Movie Trivia Features1) A variety of game difficulty levels allows you to play form Easy to Insane2) Earn coins for questions correctly answered and compare your score with friends3) Help options available for every question, just in case you are not quite sure4) Write and submit your own questions and earn game coins

reviews.title: 5 stars all the way
reviews.comment: Awsum fun game that makes u think. Cute lil movie guy has funny comments
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I like the option of submitting my own questions. I have lots of them and it\'s cool to see them in such a great game!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Grab me some popcorn! I\'m ready to head to the movies and have fun!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice interface
reviews.comment: Like how I can keep playing and just accumulate a score
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I find this app to be the most fun when playing with a friend, they can help when you don\'t know an answer.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I like that I get help if I just don\'t know the answer. And I get to keep trying until I get it right!
reviews.author: A Google User
